description:
Comprehensive Medical Malpractice And Personal Injury Representation

At Janet, Janet & Suggs, we devote our time and efforts to helping those who suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

With 14 locations across the country, our law firm is one of the largest in the nation dedicated to personal injury, medical malpractice and workers' compensation claims. Having recovered hundreds of millions of dollars on behalf of our plaintiff clients, we are also one of the most respected.

Workers' Compensation And Employment Law

From our law office in Columbia, South Carolina, the attorneys at our law firm serve clients throughout the area and the surrounding counties who seek their rightful compensation for the damages and losses they incurred because of a preventable tragedy. In addition, we also represent employees who experienced discrimination, harassment or some other injustice in the workplace.

Decades Of Experience At Work For You

When you retain our services, you will receive the benefit of a highly experienced, award-winning attorney who is fully committed to helping you obtain the maximum amount possible to cover your medical expenses, lost wages and rehabilitation costs.

Combining our decades of legal experience with the support of an extensive network of professional resources, we can handle even the most complex cases efficiently and effectively. Our law firm has on staff board-certified physicians and former nurses who can provide invaluable advice and counsel on all medical aspects of our clients' claims, enabling us to deliver a level of advocacy unmatched by other practices.

Helping You Obtain Justice

If you need help obtaining justice for your injury or loss, or if you need to bring suit against a medical professional you believe is responsible for your child's debilitating condition, you can contact Janet, Jenner & Suggs to schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation.
